title: Dont nerf Kennen
body: Dont do that pls, if you do, tell me who diceded, i will find him, and i will kill him!!{{champion:85}}

replies.body:

This is the Italian forum, you can post on the international forum, here: https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en
Kennen AD will be nerfed because he's so oppressive in competitive and also in SoloQ.
